description: Lists all of the tags associated with the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that you specify. The resource can be a capability, partnership, profile, or transformer.

parameters.name: ResourceARN
parameters.description: Requests the tags associated with a particular Amazon Resource Name (ARN). An ARN is an identifier for a specific Amazon Web Services resource, such as a capability, partnership, profile, or transformer.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: Returns the key-value pairs assigned to ARNs that you can use to group and search for resources by type. You can attach this metadata to resources (capabilities, partnerships, and so on) for any purpose.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: Specifies the name assigned to the tag that you create.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Contains one or more values that you assigned to the key name that you create.
